meaningMnemonic: This is a combination of the words 家庭 and 教師. A "teacher" who only teaches when you're with your "family" is known as a <vocabulary>tutor</vocabulary>. They don't teach you at school, they're a <vocabulary>private teacher</vocabulary> that comes to your home to help you learn.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
